location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire to Captain M E Bagnold, Paymaster to British forces at Bassidore [Bāsaʻīdū]

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has resulted in a small hole in the fabric of the folio that slightly obscures some of the body of the letter.

mods.abstract: The letter concerns negotiations for currency for the use of British forces at Bassidore [Bāsaʻīdū] and Captain Maillard. It outlines the local difficulties encountered by the Resident in negotiating these bills.
